= Shell Things =

== bashrc ==

if [ -f ~/.bash_aliases ]; then
    . ~/.bash_aliases
fi

find_git_branch() {
  # from https://github.com/jimeh/git-aware-prompt/blob/master/prompt.sh
  local branch
  if branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2> /dev/null); then
    if [[ "$branch" == "HEAD" ]]; then
      branch='detached*'
    fi
    git_branch="$branch"
  else
    git_branch=""
  fi
  echo $git_branch
}

export PS1="[\[$(tput sgr0)\]\[\033[38;5;6m\]\w\[$(tput sgr0)\]\[\033[38;5;10m\]]\[$(tput sgr0)\]\[\033[38;5;16m\]\[\033[48;5;22m\]\$(find_git_branch)\[$(tput sgr0)\]\[\033[38;5;10m\]\[$(tput sgr0)\] "
